summary: Successfully merged two complementary PTA voting systems by preserving both ballot-based elections and proposal-based decision making functionality. Created a unified system that supports both voting mechanisms with comprehensive validation, thread-safe operations, and proper authentication. The merge combined the best features from both implementations.
strategyUsed: merged both systems by preserving ballot functionality from HEAD (elections with multiple candidates) and proposal functionality from origin/main (decision voting with thread-safety). Unified data structures to support both BALLOTS and PROPOSALS, combined validation functions for both systems, integrated API endpoints with proper namespacing, and maintained thread-safe operations throughout. The result is a comprehensive voting platform supporting both election-style and decision-based voting.
